Resource Identifier
The resource identifier is expressed by a URI with the following format:
<scheme>://<host>[:<port>]/<applicationComponent>/<apiName>/<apiVersion>/<resource>/<id> <<<<<<< HEAD
URI Parameters for the Resource Identifier
Parameter
Description
scheme
The Application protocol, for example HTTP.
host
The network address to access the interface and its connected service.
port
The TCP/IP port used for access. If not specified, default ports for the applications are assumed.
applicationComponent
The name of the application component providing the resource.
apiName
The name of the interface.
apiVersion
The version mechanism is not used. The value is always v1
resource
The resource name.
id
The resource unique identifier.
